_sText:
Whilst playing on a bhop server, someone suggested to me the idea of recreating bhop_jurfs_final. Since I was very bored during this time, I decided to take the offer. 7 Hours of work later, this is the result. I do not take credit for the original map design, the praise for that goes to ruBii. However, the Bonus & Extra 2 levels were added by me, they are just to lengthen the map and make speedrunning have more variety.

Difficulty: Easy	
Length: Very Short

Hope you enjoy!
